p.br: Kindergarten registration for Fall 2020 is open online. Child must be age 5 by July 31, 2020 to attend school in the fall.

a.title: Go to comments for Kindergarten Registration

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.p: In February, the District applied for funds made available through the ND Comprehensive Literacy State Development Grant, a competitive grant process.

a.title: Go to comments for Cabinet Column - Literacy Grant

div.p: Get this week's news and events from across the Fargo Public School District in the current issue of SCHOOLTALK. This week's highlights include newsmakers, photos, and more.

a.title: Go to comments for SCHOOLTALK e-Newsletter - April 23 Issue

div.p: Fargo Public Schools will continue to provide free grab and go meals to children due to the COVID-19 school closure. Meals will be provided using a drive-through or walk-up meal pick-up process at sites listed below.

a.title: Go to comments for Free Meals for Local Children

div.p: The Davies High School senior class recently gathered for a retreat to practice kindness, respect, courage and compassion. The students engaged in a variety of activities, which helped to create a more positive and supportive school community.

a.title: Go to comments for Davies Senior Retreat

p.br: Content E-Alerts are sent to users who have subscribed to a homepage or website section of interest. You will receive an email notification when newsletters, daily announcements or School Board agendas are posted. Click here to sign up and begin the process of setting your subscriptions. Need help? Click here for directions.
